about_the_game:
This downloadable content allows you to play the game flying Mi-8 Hip helicopter. You can select it in most of the single player campaign missions, instant actions, test flights, editor missions or multiplayer.

The Mi-8 ("Hip") is a medium twin-turbine helicopter, originally designed by the Soviet Union, and now produced by Russia. In addition to its most common role as a transport helicopter, the Mi-8 is also used as an airborne command post, armed gunship, and reconnaissance platform.

Supported weapon configurations

There are in total three hardpoints, for every you can configure any of these weapons:
  • S-5 Rockets (UB32)
  • S-8 Rockets (B8V20)
  • GSH23L
  • 2x FAB-250 or 8x FAB-100 bombs
  • KMGU Dispenser
  • S-13 Rockets (BV13)
  • S-24 Rocketa
  • R-60 (AA-8 Aphid)
  • 9K114 Sturm (AT-6 Spiral) 8 missiles in total
  • 9K121 Vikhr (AT-16 Scallion) 8 missiles in total
  • 9K38 Igla 8 missiles in total

Supported campaign missions

  • Target artillery
  • Supply convoy
  • Capturing city
  • Attack airbase
  • Destroy communications
  • Lurking in the trees
  • Jungle air support
  • Night silent attack
  • Pilots down
  • Tanker attack
  • Submarine in trouble
